Attracted by a blossoming bread on the community media.
Located near the Neihu Science Park, there are many commercial buildings in the neighboring building. If you want to eat the wrong meal, you will not be wrong to choose a crowd.There are many parking grids nearby, which is pretty good parking.

Slowly stewed The pork cheeks are very soft and delicious, the overall sweet taste, the sauce is very suitable for bread and cheese; by the way, the bread has a solid aroma.
The dining environment is comfortable and the service staff attitude is cordial. Here are often organized for food and wine, which is also very suitable for charter.

The best French cuisine in the city.

I am from France and is usually very picky about French cuisine in Taiwan.I really like Comptoir Neihu: Large space, bright, and very comfortable.There is not much choice on their menus. This is a good sign of good recipes and fresh ingredients.The cheese Yangjiao bread is invisible in France, but this is a wonderful idea: it looks good, plus truffle cream, the taste is rich and fragrant.All classic French dishes are delicious.Of course, cheese, wine, etc. are the best quality in Taiwan.If you want to experience the taste of France, go to Comptoir Neihu.They also have large tables, so I think this is a good choice for groups and birthdays.

The new place in the city is definitely a must -have place ...
